EmailTemplate.description: Use this when we have an invoice but its not correctly completed and need to request for an updated version
EmailTemplate.name: Incorrect Commercial Invoice for Channel Islands
EmailTemplate.subject: Commercial Invoice Required for TNT Consignment {!Case.Consignment_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
I am emailing in relation to consignment number {!Case.Consignment_Number__c} that is going to the Channel Islands.
The consignment has been held at our depot as the goods need a commercial invoice for Customs purposes. Please can you provide this to us by return email.
Yours sincerely,
TNT Domestic Customer Service
